Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, and Wabash due to, street blockage at Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed 54th/Cermak
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing 54th/Cermak due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing 54th/Cermak due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
